articles.title: Foods to avoid in case of high uric acid level - DNA India
articles.description: Foods you should not eat to control high uric acid level
articles.content: Alcohol, particularly beer and liquor, can cause the body to produce more uric acid and excrete less of it. Avoid or use alcohol in moderation
